summary: THE BRAKES ON MY 2001 PONTIAC MONTANA WEAR OUT PREMATURELY.  I HAD TO REPLACE THE FRONT PADS 3 TIMES IN 2 YEARS.  IN EACH CASE THE INBOARD PAD HAD EXCESSIVE WEAR AND THE OUTBOARD PAD DID NOT.  I HAVE BEEN INFORMED THE WEAR INDICATORS ARE ON THE OUTBOARD PADS, THIS PRESENTS A LACK OF WARNING TO THE DRIVER THAT THE BRAKES ARE IN NEED OF SERVICE.  THE CALIPERS HAVE BEEN REPLACED ONCE AND THIS DID NOT SOLVE THE PROBLEM.*JB
